possibilities.title: Ford Motor Company
possibilities.noUrl: App no longer available in the app store
possibilities.description:
At Burrows we designed and built a range of mobile applications for Ford to support the consumer in finding the all-important information and detail they needed to confidently take that next step and visit the dealership. The user interface allows users to select different models, change colours, wheels and trim levels and learn more about technology features and specifications.

My role was to code the front end CSS/3 for the application, source assets and populate JSON files with all the relevant text for the application.

possibilities.title: University Promotional Flyers
possibilities.description:
My University degree was taken in Multimedia computing at the University of Huddersfield and the course focused on areas from graphic design to the web and 3D modelling to database architecture.

One of the assignments focused on printed design in which I produced flyers for local nightclubs and a magazine cover design. In these examples I have created the pieces using Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.

details.bullet: I am an experienced Front end developer who embraces the latest Digital trends. Working as part of a team or by myself, I like to contribute and express ideas to develop responsive, pixel perfect websites from concept through to final output.
Skilled in HTML, HTML/5, CSS/3, LESS/SASS, Javascript, jQuery, AngularJS 1 Wordpress, Grunt, Gulp, Git, Bootstrap , cross browser testing.
Lead the development of all templates provided by the UX department
CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Angular, Grunt, Gulp, responsive website development
Worked with an offshore back-end development team regarding all implementation matters
Liaised with the Technical Director on the development of internal systems and products
Integrated custom designs into an existing ASP.NET framework
HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JQuery, Bootstrap
Provided quotations for project managers and the sales team
Building HTML and CSS websites from creative concepts
Created CSS styling for Mobile and Tablet applications
Production and roll-out of multiple tablet applications

JSONTestimonialSection.header: And the nice things people have said about my work...

possibilities.description: I worked with Wayne for 12 months while at Rhapsody, during this time we worked on a number of complex builds and his knowledge and expertise helped in the smooth delivery of these projects. When clients presented problems he would work through these to find a solution to meet their needs. He also worked closely with our offshore team and would help and assist them when required. Wayne is a first class coder and I would have no problem in recommending him.
